CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 3, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Abram T. Hall, Sr., pictured last Sunday at the residence of their son and daughter, Mr. and Mrs. Abram T. Hall, Jr., in Cherokee street, when Mr. Hall celebrated his 90th birthday... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two men holding picture frames, including Abram T. Hall Sr. on right, celebrating birthday, in Hall home, Cherokee Street
